import React from "react"; import editImage from "../../assets/images/edit.svg"; import closeImage from "../../assets/images/close.svg"; import emptyImage from "../../assets/images/photo.svg"; import likeImage from "../../assets/images/like.png"; import dislikeImage from "../../assets/images/dislike.png"; import Comment from "./Comment"; function Post(props) { const toPadStart = (num) => { return num.toString() } console.log(toPadStart(props.postData.timeStamp).parseInt()) console.log(toPadStart(props.postData.timeStamp)) const formatDate = (date) => { return ` ${toPadStart(date.getDate())}/${toPadStart(date.getMonth()+1)}/${date.getFullYear()} ${date.getHours()}:${date.getMinutes()}:${date.getSeconds()} ` } const timeStampStr = formatDate(new Date(props.postData.timeStamp)) console.log(timeStampStr) return ( <> {/* MINIMIZED BLOCK */}
